Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Value: Degree Programs in Engineering Management at the University of the Pacific

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Value:
"The Engineering Management degree is designed to combine study in Engineering with selected course work in the fields of Economics and Business Administration. The objectives of the Engineering Management Program is to graduate engineers that:
1. Have the knowledge base to correctly frame engineering problems and develop corresponding solutions 2. Possess the skills to successfully implement engineering solutions within the context of an organization as an enterprise, 3. Exhibit the abilities to continuously promote excellence in themselves and others."
